description.value: Your telepathy is stronger than most shirrens', allowing you to combine physical, verbal, and telepathic communication. You can transmit emotions alongside your messages whenever you use limited telepathy. In addition, when a creature communicates with you using limited telepathy or telepathy, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Perception checks to @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.Sense Motive] against that creature.
